## <span class="section-title headline-serif underline-blue">Interactive Map</span>

Explore alumnae outcomes across eight countries. 

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(sf)

# Shapefile
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")

# 8 countries
program_countries <- c("India", "Laos", "Bangladesh", "Nepal", "Sri Lanka", "Tanzania", "Vietnam", "Cambodia")

study_map <- world[world$name %in% program_countries, ]

# Map
leaflet(study_map) |>
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") |>
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = "#00546B", fillOpacity = 0.7,
    color = "white", weight = 1,
    popup = ~name   # <- popup text shows country name
  ) |>
  setView(lng = 90, lat = 15, zoom = 3)
```
